Posts.EditableText: I need a way to set a ValueA to ValueB if ValueA is larger than ValueB. I've tried many things but none of them worked.
Posts.HTML: I need a way to set a ValueA to ValueB if ValueA is larger than ValueB. I've tried many things but none of them worked.

Posts.EditableText:
I'm trying this untested. Let me know if it works.

```
{if a>b:{@a=@b}}
```
Tell me if that dosn't work.
Posts.HTML:
I'm trying this untested. Let me know if it works.

{if a>b:{@a=@b}}

Tell me if that dosn't work.
